title: Set `VERSION` to `1.14.0-DEV`
body:
This PR won't be merged before Monday, October 27, 2025, per the [1.13 feature freeze](https://discourse.julialang.org/t/julia-1-13-feature-freeze-monday-october-27-2025/133087?u=dilumaluthge).

After this PR has been merged, the `release-1.13` branch will be created off of the commit immediately prior to this commit.

TODO list before merging this PR:
- [x] Wait until Monday, October 27, 2025
- [x] Create the `julia-release-1.13` Buildkite pipeline ([instructions here](https://github.com/JuliaCI/julia-buildkite/blob/main/devdocs/create-new-release-pipeline.md)). I'll do that sometime this week or next week.
    - Done: https://buildkite.com/julialang/julia-release-1-dot-13

TODO list after merging this PR:
- [x] Create the `release-1.13` branch in this repo.
- [x] Open the "Backports for Julia 1.13" PR in this repo.
    - Done (https://github.com/JuliaLang/julia/pull/60048).
- [x] Create a new branch named `release-julia-1.13` in the [JuliaCI/julia-buildkite repo](https://github.com/JuliaCI/julia-buildkite).
    - Done: https://github.com/JuliaCI/julia-buildkite/tree/release-julia-1.13
- [x] Make a PR (against the `backports-release-1.13` branch in this repo) to use the `release-julia-1.13` branch from the JuliaCI/julia-buildkite repo.
    - Done. Instead of making a PR, I just pushed the commit (https://github.com/JuliaLang/julia/pull/60048/commits/d78b8a1fcdb35b619f1d58e59ceff8d05d2118a2) directly to the backports branch (https://github.com/JuliaLang/julia/pull/60048).
